column4: hi, when I try to install the nVidia drivers it says I am running server X and that to install them I need to be out of server X, how do i do that?
hi, when I try to install the nVidia drivers it says I am running server X and that to install them I need to be out of server X, how do i do that?
ctrl+alt+f1, then sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop, then type the command to run the installer.
oh you must also login first.
